TextBlock.Text: FOLI: Looks like everyone's still here. No critical injuries. Let's set up a temporary shelter. Keek?
KEEK: I'm not detecting anything like those fish-like creatures we evaded. It appears they don't like entering these structures.
PILEA: Wait, everyone turn off your lights for a second! ...There! Did you see that? Near the light beacon we dropped!
KEEK: Some kind of insectoid? Doesn't look large enough to be a threat. What's it doing?
PILEA: It just jumped at the beacon. Here, let me try turning on my own light... Woah!
PILEA: Only startled. Hypothesis: these hopping creatures react strongly to light sources. I recommend that we learn from my example and keep our lights off for the time being.
